snippet: Gov. Deval Patrick of Massachusetts has appointed an insurance executive to oversee the state’s bungled effort to comply with President Obama’s health care law. The state will also pay a technology firm to help.
abstract: Gov. Deval Patrick of Massachusetts has appointed an insurance executive to oversee the state’s bungled effort to comply with President Obama’s health care law. The state will also pay a technology firm to help.

headline.main: Massachusetts Appoints Official and Hires Firm to Fix Exchange Problems
